activities:
Rakuten Marketing LLC is a business-to-business performance based online advertising company that, through a variety of service offerings, allows online advertisers to promote ad content online through a network of third-party publisher websites.  Rakuten Marketing LLC directly and through its controlled UK subsidiary Rakuten marketing Europe Limited (collectively "Rakuten Marketing") collects personal information from natural persons within member states of the European Union in the following limited instances: 
•	Rakuten Marketing collects personal information about the employees of advertisers and publishers that participate in Rakuten Marketing's advertising networks in order to provide them with online advertising services.  Collection and use of such information is governed by the terms and conditions of Rakuten Marketing’s agreements with those advertisers and publishers. 
•	Rakuten Marketing collects personal information from individuals inquiring about our services through an online form available on our website.  That information is used by Rakuten Marketing to respond to such inquiries.
•	Rakuten Marketing may record the IP (Internet Protocol) address of the browser used by a web user to click on an advertising link maintained by an advertiser and tracked as part of Rakuten Marketing’s network for purposes of identifying the browser itself and for general fraud detection.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Offline, on-line and manually processed data and human resources data.
recoursemech: TRUSTe ADR.  For more information, please see TrustE's website at http://www.truste.com/privacy_seals_and_services/enterprise_privacy/eu_safe_harbor_seal.html
